summary: This function retrieves a value that is stored an Autumn-style annotation.
formals: is the index of the value within the annotation.
returns: Return the value stored in anno at the given index.
throws: if no value in the anno is identifed by the index.
example-1: @Authors(%22Larry%22, %22Moe%22, %22Curly%22)%0Amodule Main in execution;%0A%0Aannotation Authors;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val anno = F::findAnnotation(class Main, class Authors);%0A%0A    val author1 = F::get(anno, 0);%0A    val author2 = F::get(anno, 1);    %0A    val author3 = F::get(anno, 2);%0A%0A    F::println(%22Author #1: %22 .. author1);%0A    F::println(%22Author #2: %22 .. author2);%0A    F::println(%22Author #3: %22 .. author3);%0A}
Volcano #1: (Mount Rainier, USA)%0AVolcano #2: (Mount Baker, USA)%0AVolcano #3: (Mount St. Helens, USA)%0AVolcano #4: null
